dprocess.dpserver
Class RemoteProcessIpl

java.lang.Object
  dprocess.dpserver.RemoteProcessIpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
RemoteProcess, java.rmi.Remote
public class RemoteProcessIpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements RemoteProcess

This class implements the remote process functionalities. It encapsulates the information relative to a remote process (local PID, exit status and process representation). This class implements the RemoteProcess interface and is exported and send to the remote client. The remote client can use directly all the functionalities thanks to the RMI implementation.

Version:
1.5
See Also:
RemoteProcess

Method Detail

launchProcess

public boolean launchProcess()
                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Launches the binary executable by first writing the sent data to a temporary file. The file is set with the executable rights and then launched. The local PID of the process is then parsed directly on the output stream.

Returns:
true if successful, false otherwise
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
